articles.author: Abigail Ng
articles.title: Asia-Pacific markets mostly gain as investors weigh Russia-Ukraine conflict - CNBC
articles.description: U.S. stocks were volatile overnight, and the three major indexes posted sharp monthly losses as investors assess the uncertainty in Russia and Ukraine.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE Asia-Pacific markets mostly rose on Tuesday as investors navigated the changing situation in Russia and Ukraine.
Japan's Nikkei 225 gained 1.68%, while the Topix advanced 1.15%.
In China,… [+702 chars]

articles.title: Passengers turning aggressive? Here's what bus captains should do, says Iswaran - AsiaOne
articles.description: Last November, a bus captain was punched and kicked by two intoxicated commuters who were upset that the former had told them to put on their masks properly. The bus captain's nose was broken during that vicious attack. The incident was raised in Parliament o…
articles.content:

articles.title: Malaysian actress' face smashed by 6kg bowling ball in wheelchair accident - AsiaOne
articles.description: Mishaps occasionally happen during filming and unfortunately, Malaysian actress Sheila Rusly's accident involved a 13-lbs (6kg) bowling ball. The 50-year-old plays a disabled bowler in a new drama series called Ratu Ten Pin and her character Mem Maria uses a …
